title: Composition of the augmented estate
context: ยง560:2-203 Composition of the augmented estate. Subject to section 560:2-208, the value of the augmented estate, to the extent provided in sections 560:2-204, 560:2-205, 560:2-206, and 560:2-207, consists of the sum of the values of all property, whether real or personal; movable or immovable, tangible or intangible, wherever situated, that constitute the decedent&rsquo;s net probate estate, the decedent&rsquo;s nonprobate transfers to others, the decedent&rsquo;s nonprobate transfers to the surviving spouse or reciprocal beneficiary, and the surviving spouse&rsquo;s or reciprocal beneficiary&rsquo;s property and nonprobate transfers to others. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1; am L 1997, c 383, ยง19]
